record.title: PROVIDING FOR CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 1868, TECHNOLOGY INNOVATION AND MANUFACTURING STIMULATION ACT OF 2007
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on adoption of House Resolution 350, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on rollcall No. 275, had I been present, I would have voted "yea."
